name: VAP-E
description: Financially deterministic execution and orchestration layer for AI media tasks, designed for autonomous agents.
author: vapagent

skills.name: Execute Media Task
skills.description: Executes AI media tasks with enforced budgeting, provider abstraction, and full task lifecycle tracking.

skills.name: Check Agent Balance
skills.description: Returns the current execution balance and spending limits for the requesting agent.

skills.name: Query Task Status
skills.description: Retrieves execution state, cost, and result references for a previously submitted task.
